summary: This document is a monitoring alert from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Edward Epstein, highlighting his status as a registered sex offender and detailing various legal issues and convictions related to sexual offenses and fraud. It includes multiple addresses associated with Epstein and summarizes his criminal history, including convictions for soliciting prostitution and other offenses. This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Edward Epstein, indicating critical risk priority due to his involvement in various legal issues and media coverage related to sexual offenses. It references multiple media articles discussing Epstein's legal battles and connections to high-profile individuals, including Prince Andrew. This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting various media articles related to lawsuits and legal proceedings involving him. It includes references to court rulings, settlements, and claims made by victims against Epstein, indicating ongoing legal challenges and public scrutiny. This document contains alerts from Deutsche Bank regarding Jeffrey Edward Epstein, highlighting various media articles related to his legal issues and public perception. The alerts indicate a critical risk priority associated with Epstein, referencing multiple incidents and articles that discuss his legal troubles, plea deals, and connections to underage girls.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a registered sex offender with a history of soliciting prostitution and sexual offenses against minors. He has been involved in multiple legal cases and settlements related to these charges.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Prince Andrew is mentioned in relation to his friendship with Epstein and the controversies surrounding it, particularly regarding his role as a trade envoy.

persons.name: Scott Rothstein
persons.context: Scott Rothstein is mentioned in connection with Epstein's lawsuits, where Epstein claims a link to Rothstein in the context of legal disputes.

connections.description: Prince Andrew's friendship with Jeffrey Epstein has come under scrutiny due to Epstein's criminal activities.
Epstein claims a connection to Rothstein in his lawsuits, suggesting a potential collaboration or shared involvement in legal matters.

events.title: Conviction for Soliciting Minors
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein pleaded guilty to soliciting a minor for prostitution and was convicted, serving 13 months in jail.

events.title: Served Jail Time
events.description: Epstein served 12 months for a state charge of prostitution solicitation and registered as a sex offender.

events.title: Plea to Lesser Charges
events.description: Epstein pleaded guilty to lesser state charges rather than federal charges of sexually assaulting dozens of underage girls.

events.title: Conviction for Postal Fraud
events.description: Epstein was convicted of postal fraud for stealing his neighbor's mail.

events.title: Indicted for Solicitation
events.description: Epstein was indicted on a charge of felony solicitation of prostitution.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Monitoring Alert
events.description: Deutsche Bank flagged Jeffrey Epstein for critical risk due to ongoing legal issues and media coverage.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Alert on Epstein
events.description: Deutsche Bank issued an alert regarding Jeffrey Epstein, highlighting the critical risk associated with his ongoing legal issues and media coverage.

events.title: Epstein Settles Two Lawsuits
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein settled two lawsuits related to sexual abuse claims, indicating ongoing legal challenges and settlements.
